entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as having a snakelike face and long white fingers. He is the one who casts the spell 'Avada Kedavra'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, described as standing up and gripping his wand tightly in his hand. He is the one who casts the spell 'Expelliarmus'.

relationships.description: Harry stands up and faces Voldemort, indicating a confrontation between them.
Harry casts the spell 'Expelliarmus' while Voldemort casts the spell 'Avada Kedavra', showing that they are both involved in a magical confrontation.
